Melee.Name: Meant To Do That
Melee.Effect: You are moved 10' in a random direction (determined by the GM). This movement triggers reactions

Ranged.Name: Misjudged The Distance
Ranged.Effect: Until the end of your next turn, all your ranged increment penalties are doubled

Unarmed.Name: Not The Weak Point
Unarmed.Effect: You take 1d6 persistent bleed damage and can't use this attack until the end of your next turn

Spell.Name: How Did That Happen?
Spell.Effect: You call forth a mist with the effects of Stinking Cloud centered on a corner of your space (determined randomly by the GM)

Melee.Name: Wrong End
Melee.Effect: If you are using a slashing weapon, you take 1d6 slashing damage and 1 persistent bleed damage

Ranged.Name: Phantom Wind
Ranged.Effect: You take a -2 circumstance penalty to ranged attacks until the end of your next turn

Unarmed.Name: Overthink It
Unarmed.Effect: Your target gains a +2 circumstance bonus to AC against attacks you make against it until the end of your next turn

Spell.Name: Power Down
Spell.Effect: Until healed, you are Stupefied 2

Melee.Name: Bad Fall
Melee.Effect: You fall prone and are Slowed 1 until the end of your next turn

Ranged.Name: Spraining Shot
Ranged.Effect: Until healed, you take a -10' circumstance penalty to your Land Speed and are Clumsy 1

Unarmed.Name: Bad Jam
Unarmed.Effect: You are Clumsy 1 and Enfeebled 2

Spell.Name: Exploding Skull
Spell.Effect: You must attempt a Fortitude save. If you succeed, you take 3d6 mental damage. If you fail, your head explodes and you die

Melee.Name: Wait, What?
Melee.Effect: You are Confused

Ranged.Name: Don't Hit Me!
Ranged.Effect: Until the end of your next turn, each time you miss with a ranged attack targeting enemies adjacent to any of your allies, you hit one of those adjacent allies instead (determined randomly by the GM)

Unarmed.Name: Pinched Nerve
Unarmed.Effect: Until healed, you take a -10' circumstance penalty to Land Speed and are Clumsy 1

Spell.Name: Mental Slip
Spell.Effect: You are controlled by the target until the end of your next turn

Melee.Name: Bad Grip
Melee.Effect: You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls with this weapon until the end of your next turn

Ranged.Name: Huh?
Ranged.Effect: You are confused

Unarmed.Name: Eye Strain
Unarmed.Effect: You are Dazzled until the end of your next turn

Spell.Name: Blastoff
Spell.Effect: You must succeed at a Will saveing throw or be thrown 1d6x5 feet into the air (or in a random direction determined by the GM if you are flying)

Melee.Name: Eat Dirt
Melee.Effect: You fall prone and are blinded until the end of your next turn

Ranged.Name: Overcompensate
Ranged.Effect: Cover provides a +4 circumstance bonus to AC against your ranged attacks for one minute

Unarmed.Name: That Tastes Awful!
Unarmed.Effect: If this was a jaws attack (or similar), you are Sickened 3

Spell.Name: Strange Transference
Spell.Effect: Lose one prepared spell or spell slot, determined randomly by the GM. Your target can cast this spell on its next turn even if they can't cast spells, using your level, spell attack modifier, and spell DC

Melee.Name: Vibration
Melee.Effect: If you're using a bludgeoning weapon, you drop that weapon and become Enfeebled 2 until healed

Ranged.Name: Recoil
Ranged.Effect: You are pushed 5' backwards and fall prone

Unarmed.Name: Punctured Foot
Unarmed.Effect: You take 1d4 persistent bleed damage. Until this effect ends, you take a -10' circumstance penalty to your Land Speed

Spell.Name: Mental Backlash
Spell.Effect: Until healed, you are Stupefied 3

Melee.Effect: You are Slowed 1 until the end of your next turn

Ranged.Name: Seeing Double
Ranged.Effect: You are Dazzled until the end of your next turn

Unarmed.Name: Broken Tooth
Unarmed.Effect: Until healed, you take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls

Spell.Name: Fragmented Magic
Spell.Effect: Your target gains the effect of a Mirror Image spell

Melee.Name: Attack The Darkness
Melee.Effect: Your enemies are concealed from you until the end of your next turn

Ranged.Name: Aim Carefully Next Time
Ranged.Effect: Until the end of your next turn your attacks require an extra action to use

Unarmed.Name: Brutal Collision
Unarmed.Effect: Attempt a Fortitude saving throw. If you succeed, you're Stunned 1. If you fail, you're Stunned 2

Spell.Name: Power Transfer
Spell.Effect: The highest level beneficial spell effect currently affecting you is transferred to your target

Melee.Effect: You take a -2 circumstance penalty to attack rolls until the end of your next turn

Ranged.Name: Friendly Fire
Ranged.Effect: You hit the ally nearest to the target

Unarmed.Name: Something's Broken
Unarmed.Effect: You take 1d4 bludgeoning damage, and you can't use this attack until healed

Melee.Effect: You fall prone

Ranged.Effect: You hit yourself instead of the target

Unarmed.Effect: You trigger reactions as if you had used a Move action
